CustomField.description: If related question answer type is 'Picklist', 'Multi-Select Picklist', 'Text', or 'Text Area', value to use for default value for answer. If Default Field Value is populated, that takes precedence over this value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Default value for question's answer. If Default Field Value is populated, that takes precedence over this value. NOTE: if using for the 'Record Lookup' answer type, enter a semicolon delineated list of records IDs.
CustomField.label: Default Value (Text)
